text: 8.7 1 Ko 1.5, 12.13, 16.1-2, 2 Ko 9.8 Nɨbi nɨm, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨpɨm ak, gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨpɨm. Nɨbi Klays nop gos lɨnepɨm ak, takaw agñɨtep gɨpɨm ak, gos nɨgtep gɨpɨm ak, gos awl yɨbɨl ak nɨŋɨd God wog ne gɨpɨm ak, chɨnop mapen lɨpɨm ak, anɨb okok mɨdupsek gɨtep gɨpɨm. Anɨb ak tek nep, yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gep wog anɨb ak, gɨtep gɨl mani kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨlɨtep gɨl ñɨnɨmɨb.
